ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Some images are missing, how to setup extractors ?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Which version of Heritrix are you using? We have major problem with srcset at the Danish netarkiv - but it should be dealt with by this heritrix patch

On 05/22/2018 04:55 PM, domifrey@... [archive-crawler] wrote:
> I am struggling extracting images that are linked within a srcset tag or a custom data attribute. I have implemented extractorHtml2 and extractorUniversal however only two or three image versions are archived but not all images, for example: https://www.swr.de/swr4/rp/musik/-/id=263336/5e1wrx/index.html https://www.swr.de/swr4/rp/musik/-/id=263336/5e1wrx/index.html
>   
>
>   here you find my crawler config https://drive.google.com/file/d/1aaDP99KmXJKHj68pe894U3iQDd4KGkyj/view https://drive.google.com/file/d/1aaDP99KmXJKHj68pe894U3iQDd4KGkyj/view
>   
>
>   
>
Which version of Heritrix are you using? We have major problem with 
srcset at the Danish netarkiv - but it should be dealt with by this 
heritrix patch 
https://github.com/internetarchive/heritrix3/pull/179/files (which we 
haven't pulled into our own heritrix build yet).

best regards,
Colin Rosenthal

-- 
Colin Rosenthal PhD

Royal Danish Library (Aarhus)
